document_data.name: High House of the Hunt
document_data.mainbody: The '''High House of the Hunt''' was a small temple dedicated to [[Malar]], the Beastlord, in [[Zhentil Keep]] in [[1358 DR]]. It was one of just a handful of temples dedicated to the Beastlord throughout the [[Eastern Heartlands]].
document_data.Location: The temple was located in eastern Zhentil Keep in the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]].
document_data.Inhabitants: This temple was led by Huntmaster [[Baerdeth Malagar]]. He was served by 11 other priests and nearly a score of fellow worshipers of Malar.
document_data.History: The temple was destroyed, along with most of Zhentil Keep, in the {{YearlinkName|1368}}.
